title: Trump put Musk on phone with Zelensky during call
content: During a phone call with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, former US President Donald Trump surprised many by handing the phone to Elon Musk. The nature of their conversation remains unclear, but sources suggest it was positive. This event raises questions about potential shifts in US-Ukraine relations under Trump's leadership, especially given his promise to swiftly end the conflict and Musk's significant support for Ukraine's war efforts through Starlink.
summary: During a phone call with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, former US President Donald Trump surprised many by handing the phone to Elon Musk. The nature of their conversation remains unclear, but sources suggest it was positive. This event raises questions about potential shifts in US-Ukraine relations under Trump's leadership, especially given his promise to swiftly end the conflict and Musk's significant support for Ukraine's war efforts through Starlink.

title: 'She just walked away from me': Red-district Dem's awkward meeting with Kamala Harris
content: Democrat Marie Gluesenkamp Perez, representative for Washington's 3rd district, recounted an awkward encounter with Vice President Kamala Harris at a Christmas party. She said she noticed that all garlands in the party were plastic. “I was strong-armed into taking a picture. I said, ‘Madam Vice President, we grow those where I live,'” Gluesenkamp told her but she didn't pay any attention.
summary: Democrat Marie Gluesenkamp Perez, representative for Washington's 3rd district, recounted an awkward encounter with Vice President Kamala Harris at a Christmas party. She said she noticed that all garlands in the party were plastic. “I was strong-armed into taking a picture. I said, ‘Madam Vice President, we grow those where I live,'” Gluesenkamp told her but she didn't pay any attention.

title: Donald Trump handed phone to Elon Musk during call with Zelensky: Reports
content: Zeelensky called Trump to congratulate him on the election win and Trump, according to the reports, "did not leave Zelensky with a feeling of despair". "Musk also weighed in during the call to say he will continue supporting Ukraine through his Starlink," reports said. Donald Trump's chat with Zelensky was also positive, the reports said.
summary: Zeelensky called Trump to congratulate him on the election win and Trump, according to the reports, "did not leave Zelensky with a feeling of despair". "Musk also weighed in during the call to say he will continue supporting Ukraine through his Starlink," reports said. Donald Trump's chat with Zelensky was also positive, the reports said.

title: Israeli football fans clash with protesters in Amsterdam
Pakistan says it can serve as bridge between US and China
content: Pakistan has stated its intention to mediate between the United States and China amidst escalating global tensions. Despite close military ties with the US, Pakistan's economy relies heavily on China, prompting a neutral stance in the face of US-China rivalry. Islamabad emphasized its enduring strategic partnership with China, unaffected by US political shifts, while also expressing a commitment to strengthening its long-standing relationship with the US.
summary: Pakistan has stated its intention to mediate between the United States and China amidst escalating global tensions. Despite close military ties with the US, Pakistan's economy relies heavily on China, prompting a neutral stance in the face of US-China rivalry. Islamabad emphasized its enduring strategic partnership with China, unaffected by US political shifts, while also expressing a commitment to strengthening its long-standing relationship with the US.

title: Who is Robert Lighthizer whom Trump has asked to be US trade chief?
content: Donald Trump has reportedly asked Robert Lighthizer to rejoin his administration as US Trade Representative. Lighthizer, known for his protectionist stance and alignment with Trump's trade policies, previously served in the same role during Trump's first term. His potential return will signal a renewed focus on aggressive trade tactics, including tariffs on imports.
summary: Donald Trump has reportedly asked Robert Lighthizer to rejoin his administration as US Trade Representative. Lighthizer, known for his protectionist stance and alignment with Trump's trade policies, previously served in the same role during Trump's first term. His potential return will signal a renewed focus on aggressive trade tactics, including tariffs on imports.

title: Elon Musk calls Kimmel 'insufferable'; Jimmy replies, 'At least my children like me'
content: "At least my children like me," Kimmel gave Elon Musk back referring to Musk's estranged daughter 20-year-old Vivian Wilson who publicly severed ties with her father and left not chance to berate him -- the election being the one as Wilson announced that she sees no future in Trump's US.

title: 'Everywhere you looked was sex': Diddy once decorated Freak Off room with hundreds of mirrors
content: Money was not a problem, the planner said divulging that the room was where Diddy hosted many high-profile parties that turned into orgies after certain hours at night. The cost per party was $500,000. "This is for both the mainstream part and the sex party afterwards," the planner said. On the specific mirror decoration, the planner recalled that those mirrors were then taken off and the room went back to its original state and that decoration was only for the party.
summary: Money was not a problem, the planner said divulging that the room was where Diddy hosted many high-profile parties that turned into orgies after certain hours at night. The cost per party was $500,000. "This is for both the mainstream part and the sex party afterwards," the planner said. On the specific mirror decoration, the planner recalled that those mirrors were then taken off and the room went back to its original state and that decoration was only for the party.

title: Ted Cruz's daughter viral for her 'eww-like' expression on Donald Trump: 'Don't clap'
content: ​"I hope and pray Donald Trump will be re-elected as the president of the United States," Ted Cruz said to the cheers of the audience and her wife was also clapping when their daughter Caroline made a disgusting expression and told her mother to not clap for that. In 2016 when Ted Cruz ran for president election before endorsing Trump, Trump called his wife ugly and asked whether Cruz can be US president because he was born in Canada.

In 2016 when Ted Cruz ran for president election before endorsing Trump, Trump called his wife ugly and asked whether Cruz can be US president because he was born in Canada.

title: Tim Walz's daughter melts down on TikTok: 'This country does not deserve Kamala Harris'
content: Coming to President-elect Donald Trump and Vice-President-elect JD Vance, Hope said those two will have to live in their own skin and that's a punishment that she would never wish upon anybody except for them. “These people have to live in their own skin, as in JD Vance and Donald Trump have to be JD Vance and Donald Trump and that is not a punishment I’d wish upon anybody but those two individuals,” the 23-year-old said.

title: Ex-bank manager sentenced to 13 months for stealing $200K from customer's account
content: James Gomes, a former bank manager in New York, was sentenced to 13 months in prison for stealing over $200,000 from a customer's account. Gomes used his position to transfer funds to his personal accounts and even continued the scheme after the customer's death. He will also serve three years of supervised release and must repay the stolen money.
summary: James Gomes, a former bank manager in New York, was sentenced to 13 months in prison for stealing over $200,000 from a customer's account. Gomes used his position to transfer funds to his personal accounts and even continued the scheme after the customer's death. He will also serve three years of supervised release and must repay the stolen money.

title: 'You're upset because...': Elon Musk's daughter calls estranged father 'grubby, little, control freak'
content: As Elon Musk reacted to a news story of his estranged daughter Vivian Jenna Wilson deciding to leave the US seeing no future in the second Trump administration -- his father is a part of that -- Vivian unleashed a scathing attack on her father and called him a delusional, grubby, little control freak who hasn't matured for 38 years.
summary: As Elon Musk reacted to a news story of his estranged daughter Vivian Jenna Wilson deciding to leave the US seeing no future in the second Trump administration -- his father is a part of that -- Vivian unleashed a scathing attack on her father and called him a delusional, grubby, little control freak who hasn't matured for 38 years.

title: With Trump in White House, will Elon Musk's Mars mission get a boost?
content: Musk, who appeared at a Trump rally in October sporting an “Occupy Mars” T-shirt, reportedly spent $119 million supporting Trump’s White House bid. Just last month, Musk announced that SpaceX’s Starship could land on Mars by 2026, with a crewed mission planned four years later. Trump has also voiced interest in Musk’s goals, describing the moon as a stepping stone to Mars in recent statements.
summary: Musk, who appeared at a Trump rally in October sporting an “Occupy Mars” T-shirt, reportedly spent $119 million supporting Trump’s White House bid. Just last month, Musk announced that SpaceX’s Starship could land on Mars by 2026, with a crewed mission planned four years later. Trump has also voiced interest in Musk’s goals, describing the moon as a stepping stone to Mars in recent statements.

title: Racist text messages reported after election: 'Greetings you have been selected to...'
content: Following Donald Trump's election victory, a wave of racist text messages targeted Black individuals across multiple states, including students. The messages, claiming to be from "A TRUMP SUPPORTER," threatened recipients with forced labor on plantations. The FBI is investigating these messages, while the Trump campaign denies any involvement. Trump campaign spokesperson Steven Cheung said the campaign has absolutely nothing to do with these text messages.
summary: Following Donald Trump's election victory, a wave of racist text messages targeted Black individuals across multiple states, including students. The messages, claiming to be from "A TRUMP SUPPORTER," threatened recipients with forced labor on plantations. The FBI is investigating these messages, while the Trump campaign denies any involvement. Trump campaign spokesperson Steven Cheung said the campaign has absolutely nothing to do with these text messages.

title: JK Rowling reacts to Donald Trump's win: 'Left has f**ked up monumentally'
content: "I'm not saying Trump's win was down to the gender stuff - I'm not an American voter, so can't judge. In any case, the Labour Party won the last UK election and they've embraced gender identity ideology whole-heartedly (although they won against a Tory government so enfeebled and unpopular it would have been miraculous if they hadn't, and their popularity since gaining office has plummeted.)" Rowling wrote.
summary: "I'm not saying Trump's win was down to the gender stuff - I'm not an American voter, so can't judge. In any case, the Labour Party won the last UK election and they've embraced gender identity ideology whole-heartedly (although they won against a Tory government so enfeebled and unpopular it would have been miraculous if they hadn't, and their popularity since gaining office has plummeted.)" Rowling wrote.

title: Ice Maiden: Five things to know about Susie Wiles, Trump's chief of staff
content: In a swift move following his win over Kamala Harris, President-elect Donald Trump has named Susie Wiles, his campaign chief, as White House Chief of Staff. Wiles, a seasoned Republican strategist and key figure in Trump’s campaign machinery, will now oversee daily White House operations, marking a new chapter in her long political career.
summary: In a swift move following his win over Kamala Harris, President-elect Donald Trump has named Susie Wiles, his campaign chief, as White House Chief of Staff. Wiles, a seasoned Republican strategist and key figure in Trump’s campaign machinery, will now oversee daily White House operations, marking a new chapter in her long political career.

title: 'Will put your fat a** in prison': Donald Trump ally's warning to NY's Letitia James
content: Donald Trump's ally Mike Davis who may become a White House counsel has now given an open threat to James and said the Trump administration will put her "fat a**" in prison for conspiracy against rights. In a Benny Johnson podcast, he said, "I dare you to try to continue your lawfare against President Trump in his second term...Listen here, sweetheart, we're not messing around this time and we will put your fat a** in prison for conspiracy against rights."

title: Putin open to discuss Ukraine with Trump while upholding Russia's demands: Kremlin
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin expressed his willingness to engage in discussions about Ukraine with US President-elect Donald Trump. While open to dialogue, Putin maintained that Russia's position on Ukraine remains unchanged. Putin congratulated Trump on his victory, praising his courage and expressing interest in his stance on Ukraine and Russia.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin expressed his willingness to engage in discussions about Ukraine with US President-elect Donald Trump. While open to dialogue, Putin maintained that Russia's position on Ukraine remains unchanged.  Putin congratulated Trump on his victory, praising his courage and expressing interest in his stance on Ukraine and Russia.

title: After Donald Trump's victory Americans explore moving abroad options online
content: Following Donald Trump's projected second term win, Americans are showing a renewed interest in emigration. Google searches for "move to Canada," "New Zealand," and "Australia" have skyrocketed, mirroring the trend seen after the 2016 election. Immigration lawyers and consultants are reporting a surge in inquiries from concerned Americans citing societal anxieties and fears of diminishing freedoms.
summary: Following Donald Trump's projected second term win, Americans are showing a renewed interest in emigration. Google searches for "move to Canada," "New Zealand," and "Australia" have skyrocketed, mirroring the trend seen after the 2016 election.  Immigration lawyers and consultants are reporting a surge in inquiries from concerned Americans citing societal anxieties and fears of diminishing freedoms.

title: Why the British Royal family wear red poppy pins in November
content: The British royal family, including Prince William, Kate Middleton, Prince Harry, and Meghan Markle, demonstrate unity by wearing red poppy pins every November to commemorate Remembrance Day. The tradition, rooted in John McCrae's World War I poem "In Flanders Fields," honors fallen soldiers. The royals participate in various commemorative events, culminating in a ceremony at The Cenotaph in London.
summary: The British royal family, including Prince William, Kate Middleton, Prince Harry, and Meghan Markle, demonstrate unity by wearing red poppy pins every November to commemorate Remembrance Day. The tradition, rooted in John McCrae's World War I poem "In Flanders Fields," honors fallen soldiers. The royals participate in various commemorative events, culminating in a ceremony at The Cenotaph in London.
